description: Crispy fish bites with a tangy and crunchy salsa.
name: Fish Bites with Mango Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium mango, peeled, decored and finely diced
1 medium red onion, peeled and finely diced
1 small red capsicum, deseeded and finely diced
2 medium eggs, cracked and lightly beaten
4 small barramundi fillets, no skin or bone and sliced into 1 inch bites

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the salsa ingredients by chopping and mixing together in a bowl and allow to set while you cook the fish.
You need 3 bowls, 1 you can sift the flour into, the 2nd place the lightly beaten eggs and the polenta in the 3rd.
Place the barramundi pieces in the flour and cover fully, then dip into the egg and finally cover in polenta and set aside.
Shallow fry the breaded fish for 6 minutes turning halfway.
Remove from the heat and allow some of the excess oil to drain on some kitchen paper.
Serve with the mango relish on the side.
